Faults.message:
We're aware of a power cut in the area shown, affecting 88 homes. This unplanned fault is affecting the local area, and it's likely several streets in the area are affected by the same power cut.

Wehave engineers on the way and they are due to arrive in your local area at00:10 17/07/2025. Once they arrive, they will get straight to workon investigating the fault and attempt to restore your power. We will continueto update this message with any new information. At this stage, we're aiming tohave your power restored by 07:00 17/07/2025.

The cause of this power cut is a fault on our overhead network. This is the most common type of fault we see, and our teams are very experienced in dealing with these issues. In most cases, our engineers are able to get your power back on by simply replacing a fuse at the local substation, however, if the fault is severe, this may take us longer to fix. If this does happen, we will let you know.

If you need more information, please send us a message on Whatsapp or call us on 105 and quote reference 'RG6404'
